Nestling on off Bannerghatta Road, Bangalore MASTER ROYAL MEENAKSHI Apartment is engulfed by an aura of divinity thanks to the famous Meenakshi Temple facing it. The 42 acres of sprawling landscape belonging to the Horticulture Department and Horticulture College graces the apartment with soothing greenery. Just at a few minutes' walk away is Meenakshi Mall fulling your shopping needs. Since Namma Metro station is very near and NICE Road is only 2 kms away from the apartment, it scores well on connectivity front also. Moreover, reputed Educational Institutions and Specialty Hospitals are all in the vicinity of Meenakshi. Meenakshi is an aesthetically designed marvel of 4 blocks - Apartment with 50% open space letting in abundant natural lighting and fresh air. It is a mix of fun and healthy life style offering you value for money. For a life time.

1280 sqft
STATUS
Ready to Move
FLOOR
9 out of 12 floors
TRANSACTION
Resale
East Facing Property Near Hoodi Railway Station
Loaded with a bouquet of state-of-the-art amenities, this 3BHK Flat at SMR Vinay Galaxy, Hoodi of Bangalore is an epitome of lavishness and uniqueness. This A-Khata property with OC available is out for sale and comes with no loan attached. Property SpecificationsIn a sky-scraping apartment of 12 floors, this Vastu compliant flat with an east-facing entrance welcomes happiness, success, and good luck. Favored with sufficient cross ventilation, this radiant flat with entries and two exists has no common walls on the floor. This semi-furnished flat encompasses 3 bedrooms with wardrobes, 2 bathrooms, 2 balconies, a utility room, a living cum dining area with a TV unit, and a modular kitchen. Outfitted with anti-skid tiles are both the western style bathrooms appointed with geysers and fittings, where one bathroom is attached and the other is commonly available. A lovely view of the pool terrace is visible from the balconies of which 1st balcony is linked to the living room & the 2nd is connected to the kid's room. Take pleasure in cooking in the modular kitchen that has a granite platform, stainless steel sink, necessary cabinets cum pullouts, and a chimney to vent the fumes and odor out. To enhance the look of the abode, the vitrified tiles are used for the flooring which brighten-up the appeal of the residence. To ensure maximum safety, this flat is installed with an intercom system. FacilitiesSMR Vinay Galaxy is a meticulously designed apartment that offers you a wide range of amenities and facilities like 100% power back up, 3 lifts per Wing, 24hours water supply, 2 swimming pools, gymnasium, indoor play area; park, reserved parking, security, private terrace/garden, visitors parking, intercom facility, maintenance staff, waste disposal, internet/Wi-fi connectivity, Adda mobile application, RO plant, jogging/strolling track, outdoor tennis court, Basket Ball court, cricket net practice, mini-amphitheater and badminton court. Parking is not a constraint as covered parking space for 1 car and 1 bike in close proximity to the lift.LocalityWithin 2-3km of distance are the famous Decathlon store, Forum Mall, Phoenix Mall, VR Bengaluru Mall, Brookfield Mall, Inorbit Mall, Virginia Mall, Metro Cash and Carry Brand Factory, and the Manipal Multispeciality Hospital, Vydehi Hospital, and Sai Baba Hospital. At a 50m distance, you have City Super Bazaar, Meghna Maternity and Pharmacy, and Clay DayCare.The famous Gopalan School, the Brigade school, National High School, Deens Academy, Whitefield Global School, Ryan International, Vibgyor, and Euro School are stationed in close proximity. Some of the leading banks like HDFC, ICICI, SBI, Yes Bank, PNB, and ATM centers catering to your financial needs are close by. Situated close to Outer Ring Road, SMR Vinay Galaxy is about 800m away from the upcoming metro station and ITPL is at a 2km range. Society is very lively as all festivals are celebrated with fun and fair.

Up for sale is a remarkably designed 2BHK villa in Ramagondanahalli-Whitefield, Bangalore. Nestled in one of the sought after residential areas; this freehold property is certainly the right abode to live a blissful life with loved ones. So; seize this opportunity right away!!Property SpecificationsSpanning across a carpet area of 1440sqft, this main road facing 2BHK villa is in the bylane of Palm Meadows which is undoubtedly a premium and prestigious address of Bangalore. Facing the east direction; this villa constructed as per the Vaastu guidelines promises its residents a life filled with happiness and prosperity, which is yet another good reason for going with this property.Blessed with adequate natural light and fresh air; this villa is spread over the ground and first floors. Speaking of the floor plan; the ground floor encompasses a drawing hall, dining hall, kitchen, washroom, a backyard with a washing area, and a lawn & parking in the front.Further, the 1st floor comprises 2 bedrooms (a master bedroom and a kids’ bedroom) with attached bathrooms. Also, both bedrooms are facilitated with trendy wardrobes so you get enough space to keep your belongings tidily and safely. Residents here can feel the cool ambience in all seasons as ACs are installed in both the bedrooms and in the drawing hall.Modular is the kitchen of this villa and is complete with a gleaming countertop, sink, a chimney and exhaust fan. Moving to the flooring part; top-quality vitrified tiles are covered on the flooring of all the rooms in this villa and the terrace has red tiles flooring.FacilitiesThis property is a part of a premium gated residential society that is filled with an array of amenities such as Restaurant, Banquet Hall, Conference Room, Bar, Swimming Pools, Gym, Aerobics Hall, Health Club, Spa, Badminton Courts, Squash Court, Table Tennis Courts, Library, Indoor and Outdoor Children's Play Area. Also, round the clock water supply and power backup are provided and 1 open car parking is available in front of the villa.LocalityWell-developed locality with key amenities at proximity makes this property worth considering to reside with the family. Favored with sufficient cross ventilation, this radiant flat with entries and two exists has no common walls on the floor. This semi-furnished flat encompasses 3 bedrooms with wardrobes, 2 bathrooms, 2 balconies, a utility room, a living cum dining area with a TV unit, and a modular kitchen. Outfitted with anti-skid tiles are both the western style bathrooms appointed with geysers and fittings, where one bathroom is attached and the other is commonly available. Benefitted with complete freehold ownership rights, this property aged less than 5 years is relatively new and absolutely ready for possession. Skilfully crafted with optimum use of space, the ground floor comprises a bedroom with en-suite bathroom, living room, dining hall and kitchen. On the 1st floor you have 2 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and a spacious family living room that opens onto a well-proportioned balcony that offers pleasant view of the verdant garden. Coming to the configuration of the 2nd floor, it encompasses a bedroom with en-suite bathroom and large terrace space that is partially covered as well. Exquisitely designed, all the bedrooms are spacious and furnished with wardrobes. Outfitted with premium quality sanitary ware, all the chic en-suite bathrooms are designed in western style. Adorned with an attractive TV unit and puja unit, the generously-sized living room allows you to have a perfect setting for relaxing and entertaining. Providing comfortable cooking space, the kitchen here decked with a gleaming counter-top, stainless-steel sink, chimney and storage cabinets is a well-organized modular unit. The utility space and the balcony here are outfitted with pristine glass roof top and partial fabrication work has been done on the terrace. Further, the trendy interiors and the flooring topped up with flawless Italian marble enhance the overall aesthetic appeal of his villa. FacilitiesThis residential property is sited in a peaceful & secure gated colony that is favoured with top-notch amenities such as community hall, outdoor tennis court, basketball court, well-equipped gym, beautiful garden and kids play area. Prime facilities like 2 covered parking space, round the clock water supply and tight security services are provided too. LocalityAdvantageously located, this property is well-connected to the other parts of the city via various modes of public transport. Horamavu bus stand is just 0.5km away. Furthermore, Agara lake development and the 80ft double road extension work are in progress. For your daily household needs, the noted Family Supermarket is available within a stretch of 3km. The reputed Chrysalis High School, NPS & VIBGYOR School, Angel Hospital and Mediplus Hospital are within proximity.

All these balconies will be perfect for enjoying your morning or evening cup of tea/coffee. Vitrified tiles will be used for the flooring, which are known for their quality and durability. One covered parking space is available for placing your vehicle. All the balconies capture an uninterrupted view of the society out of which one is attached to the hall and another one is connected to the master bedroom. Placing your clothes in a systematic way will be now easy as there are wardrobes available in all the bedrooms. Furthermore, the flooring of this flat is nicely covered with premium-quality vitrified tiles. Facilities The facilities provided for this flat are covered parking space, adequate water supply, power back up and round the clock security surveillance along with CCTV cameras. The society is also equipped with 2 lifts, gym, pool, clubhouse, party hall, and play area. Locality Talacauvery Layout is the residential hub which is served with good social and physical infrastructure and favoured with excellent road connectivity. A number of renowned schools, healthcare centres, shopping malls, banks, ATMs and supermarkets are located within the vicinity. Since this residential property is located near the main road, public transport facilities such as autos, taxis and buses are instantly available within this area.

MAGICBRICKS EXCLUSIVE
  Request Photo
Posted: Today
₹ 7 Cr
4 BHK Villa for Sale in Ramagondanahalli-Whitefield, Whitefield
CARPET AREA
3250 sqft
STATUS
Ready to Move
TRANSACTION
Resale
OWNERSHIP
Freehold
Get ready to live a life full of comforts!!! Available for sale is this brilliantly designed 4 BHK villa in one of the prime areas of Bangalore, i.e. in Ramagondanahalli-Whitefield, Bangalore. Property specificationReady to move in this villa is spanning across a super area of 3250 sq ft and is benefited with freehold ownership rights. This exclusive is available in an absolutely well maintained condition though its age of construction lies between 15 to 20 years. This brilliantly crafted villa spreads over the ground + 1 floor. The ground floor comprises 2 bedrooms with attached bathrooms, a living room, dining room, family room, store room, visitors toilet, puja closet, utility area and a servant room with attached bathroom. Moreover, this villa has ample space place your vehicles in the garage with remote controlled door. The spacious bedrooms feature a walk-in wardrobe and study room feature wooden shelves with large capacity. All the doors & windows have pelmets, while the living room consists a bar with 3 bar stools. One visitor's toilet is attached to the dining room and can be termed as a common bathroom. Moving on, the 1st floor encompasses 2 bedrooms with attached bathrooms, a study room and 2 balconies. Of the 2 balconies, 1 west facing balcony is connected to the master bedroom, while the other east facing balcony is connected to another bedroom. The 2 bathrooms in first floor are attached to the master bedroom and to the guest bedroom; the latter bathroom is also attached to the study room. All the bathrooms are fashioned in a western manner except for the servant room, which is styled in an Indian manner. Additionally, 2 bathrooms in the ground as well as the 1st floor are benefited with a geyser. The modular kitchen of this stunning villa is well appointed with storage cabinets, chimney, hob, granite platform and a stainless sink. Lastly, flooring of the entire villa is finished with marble tiles except for the kitchen, which is decked with granite tiles.FacilitiesThe covered car parking space can accommodate around two cars of medium size and has a remote controlled door in the garage. Moreover, drive-in exists in front of the garage to park two more cars. Furthermore, the villa is located in a secured gated colony and also all the doors in this villa have an alarm when opened. LocalityPalm Meadows is very well served in all the areas such as school, markets, malls, ATMs etc. All international school buses serve Palm Meadows. The Colombia Asia hospital is located to the next door. A major attraction to Palm Meadows is its club which is of international standards.

subraman

Freehold
East Facing Property Near wipro corporate office
Depicting ultra-modern architecture and premium quality finishings, this premium 4-BHK villa is up for sale in the prime location of Bangalore. It is a perfect investment option for those who are searching for a spacious real-estate property in this metro city and is ideal for both residential as well as commercial purposes. On top of that, this property is offered along with exclusive freehold ownership rights.Property specificationsWell-loaded with essential facilities and encompassing meticulous-crafted floor plan, this magnificent villa is extended across 3 spacious floors. The entire building is well-built in accordance with Vastu-principles and is bestowed with abundant natural light for the whole day, thereby offers a healthy indoor atmosphere for its occupants. Designed to perfection, the ground floor incorporates an airy bedroom with an attached bathroom, a well-organized kitchen, and a sizable hall, while the equally impressive 1st floor comprises 3 generous-sized bedrooms, 1 common bathroom, and 1 wide balcony. Further, the 2nd floor of this villa features an open terrace and 1 storeroom. Now, coming to the flooring, it is bedecked with the ideal combination of stylish wooden tiles and high-quality vitrified tiles. Undoubtedly, this flooring not only uplifts the overall elegance and gives it a rich visual appeal but also ensures carefree maintenance. More importantly, a well-maintained garden is available in front of this villa and is a great place to spend leisure time in different recreational activities. FacilitiesThe basic facilities such as round the clock water supply, 100% power backup, and 1 covered parking slot are provided. LocalityFor quality-education, several prestigious educational institutes are available within the proximity and for essential medical support, the world-renowned Columbia Asia Hospital is easily reachable within a 1.5km distance. The famous Central Mall is located at a 1.5km distance for shopping and entertainment. The noted Canara Bank as well as State Bank of India are available nearby for important banking services. Moreover, all kinds of public transportation facilities are readily accessible including a railway station located at a short distance of 1.5km.

The market is at a walkable distance and one can find daily needs shops at a stretch of 200m. Several nationalised/private banks and ATMs can be found within 1km. Residents can go to other parts of the city effortlessly as buses, autos and other modes of transport are frequently available and the bus stop is also close by.

MAGICBRICKS EXCLUSIVE
  Request Photo
Posted: Today
₹ 7 Cr
4 BHK Villa for Sale in Ramagondanahalli-Whitefield, Whitefield
CARPET AREA
3250 sqft
STATUS
Ready to Move
TRANSACTION
Resale
OWNERSHIP
Freehold
Get ready to live a life full of comforts!!! Available for sale is this brilliantly designed 4 BHK villa in one of the prime areas of Bangalore, i.e. in Ramagondanahalli-Whitefield, Bangalore. Property specificationReady to move in this villa is spanning across a super area of 3250 sq ft and is benefited with freehold ownership rights. This exclusive is available in an absolutely well maintained condition though its age of construction lies between 15 to 20 years. This brilliantly crafted villa spreads over the ground + 1 floor. The ground floor comprises 2 bedrooms with attached bathrooms, a living room, dining room, family room, store room, visitors toilet, puja closet, utility area and a servant room with attached bathroom. Moreover, this villa has ample space place your vehicles in the garage with remote controlled door. The spacious bedrooms feature a walk-in wardrobe and study room feature wooden shelves with large capacity. All the doors & windows have pelmets, while the living room consists a bar with 3 bar stools. One visitor's toilet is attached to the dining room and can be termed as a common bathroom. Moving on, the 1st floor encompasses 2 bedrooms with attached bathrooms, a study room and 2 balconies. Of the 2 balconies, 1 west facing balcony is connected to the master bedroom, while the other east facing balcony is connected to another bedroom. The 2 bathrooms in first floor are attached to the master bedroom and to the guest bedroom; the latter bathroom is also attached to the study room. All the bathrooms are fashioned in a western manner except for the servant room, which is styled in an Indian manner. Additionally, 2 bathrooms in the ground as well as the 1st floor are benefited with a geyser. The modular kitchen of this stunning villa is well appointed with storage cabinets, chimney, hob, granite platform and a stainless sink. Lastly, flooring of the entire villa is finished with marble tiles except for the kitchen, which is decked with granite tiles.FacilitiesThe covered car parking space can accommodate around two cars of medium size and has a remote controlled door in the garage. Moreover, drive-in exists in front of the garage to park two more cars. Furthermore, the villa is located in a secured gated colony and also all the doors in this villa have an alarm when opened. LocalityPalm Meadows is very well served in all the areas such as school, markets, malls, ATMs etc. All international school buses serve Palm Meadows. The Colombia Asia hospital is located to the next door. A major attraction to Palm Meadows is its club which is of international standards.
